H0.text: Which torture chamber was invented by George Orwell. The Iron Maiden

H2.text: Which torture chamber was invented by George Orwell. The Pit

H3.text: Which torture chamber was invented by George Orwell. Room101

A4.text: Room 101 (pronounced one-oh-one), introduced in the climax of the novel, is the basement torture chamber in the Ministry of Love.
